Immediate Pullback of Jaitun Unit from Iraq Demanded 
    Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification reportedly issued a statement titled "We condemn the government and the Uri Party for having railroaded the treacherous motion calling for extending again presence of the south Korean troops in Iraq through the National Assembly" on Dec. 30 last year.
 Referring to the fact that the "motion calling for extending again the presence of south Korean troops in Iraq" the keynote of which is the extension of the presence of Jaitun unit was passed at the session of the NA that day, the statement noted that the ruling party revealed its true colors as a servant of the U.S. by cooperating with the U.S. in its Iraqi war of aggression.    
 The statement branded the action taken by the government and the ruling party to support the U.S. war of aggression against Iraq and extend again the presence of troops in Iraq as an act of blindly worshipping the U.S. and submitting to it, demanding an immediate pullback of the troops from Iraq.
